        expression: AssignmentOperation(

                left: Variable(

                        SimpleVariable {
                            span: Span(
                                4,
                                1,
                            ),
                            name: "$a",
                        },
                    ),
                ),
                equals: Span(
                    4,
                    4,
                ),
                right: Literal(
                    Integer(
                        LiteralInteger {
                            value: "4",
                            span: Span(
                                4,
                                6,
                            ),
                        },
                    ),
                ),
            },
        ),
        ending: Semicolon(
            Span(
                4,
                7,
            ),
        ),
    },
    Expression {
        expression: AssignmentOperation(
            Assign {
                left: Variable(
                    SimpleVariable(
                        SimpleVariable {
                            span: Span(
                                6,
                                1,
                            ),
                            name: "$b",
                        },
                    ),
                ),
                equals: Span(
                    6,
                    4,
                ),
                right: Match {
                    keyword: Span(
                        6,
                        6,
                    ),
                    condition: Parenthesized {
                        left_parenthesis: Span(
                            6,
                            12,
                        ),
                        inner: Variable(
                            SimpleVariable(

                                    span: Span(
                                        6,
                                        13,
                                    ),
                                    name: "$a",
                                },
                            ),
                        ),
                        right_parenthesis: Span(
                            6,
                            15,
                        ),

                    default: None,
                    arms: [],

        ending: Semicolon(
            Span(
                7,
